name: Wirand
description:
Welcome to my very first project!

I've created platformer game whitch you might like.

Feel free to leave feedback, I wall highly appreciate it.

Controls : 

---------------------------------------------------- A - D (Move) W (Jump and move up on ladders) S (Exit trees and move down on ladders) E (Climb into tree) Space (Activate level portal) Mouse buttons (Shoot) Shift (Sword) Esc (Pause) ---------------------------------------------------- Arrows (Move the camera) Home (Return camera into normal place) R (Restart level(for testing purposes only))
